name: Perplexed Cassete
description:
Explore an evolving world with multiple endings while traveling in time. Made for "a jam about time" in 2 weeks.

Notice: For the best experience please download the macOS or Windows version

Notice: this game contains rapidly flashing light. If you are light sensitive please disable flashing in the settings menu

Controls:

   Hold F to travel forwards in time for 5 seconds.

   Hold B to travel backwards in time for 5 seconds.

   Press R to restart current level.

   Once you get the wall climbing ability hold W to use it.

   Use WASD to move.

   Press SPACE to jump.

Credits:

   Music - @Seapruittmusic

   Programming -@Maxall4

   Art - @Lexicon86

   Level Design - @IanX
